sub_title: Director of CRM & Analytics / Head of AI / Data Science
summary:
I have more than fifteen years of experience working for leading international companies in Ukraine, Russia, Cyprus, Belarus, and the Netherlands. I was responsible for implementing Data Science, Customer Analytics, CRM, and customer loyalty management solutions. My main goal was the strategic development of the whole analytics and customer management direction, creating it "from zero level", hiring a team, and implementing all technological pipelines, analytical and targeted communication frameworks. 

  I was responsible for various Customer Analytics projects and initiatives like:
CRM Analytical Warehouse and Data Mining tools implementation (SAS, Teradata), Data Quality projects, BI and Reporting system implementation (Tableau). During my tenure, I've led a team of data scientists who built a customer churn prediction, CLV/LTV scoring, next-best-action, customer potential scoring models based on Machine Learning algorithms under my guidance, and automated Data Mining function based on SAS Factory Miner platform and AutoML frameworks.   

  Also, I was responsible for the development of the Analytical and Operational CRM strategies, key policies, and customer experience management processes, including customer information center based on CRM solution (strategies for cross/up-selling and service based on client’s behavior and segment). I've successfully launched several retail CRM initiatives (Oracle Siebel CRM, SAP CRM, PEGA CRM implementation), including projects in Sales, Tele-Marketing, Contact Centers, Branch Customer Service, Business Core Functionality.

   For example, I've led a division (12 persons) with strategic priorities of implementing CRM, Data mining, customer analytics programs in a leading bank in CIS.  I was responsible for the development of the CRM strategy both from operational and analytical sides, key policies, and customer management processes, including customer information center based on CRM solution (strategies for cross/up-selling and service based on client’s behavior and segment). I've successfully launched a retail CRM program (Siebel CRM implementation), including 5 projects: Sales, Tele-Marketing, Contact centers, Branches, Business Core Functionality.

  I have extensive work experience in Telecom, Finance, Fashion eCommerce, Gaming and Retail industries. Organized several courses on CRM and Data Science. 

Specialties:
Data Mining
Customer Insights
Developing Scoring Models
Machine-Based Learning
Artificial Intelligence
CRM & Customer Base Management
CRM Strategic Development
Targeted Marketing
Loyalty Management

school.name: Academy of National Economy under the Government of the Russian Federation
Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (State University) (MIPT)

projects.title: Siebel CRM Implementation at Mobile TeleSystems OJSC (MTS)
projects.description: As a member of the Accenture's team participated in the consultant team-lead role in scope definition and analysis phases of the customer services functional domain.

contributors.headline: Director of CRM & Analytics / Head of AI / Data Science
Managing Director, Account Executive Operations | Accenture

profile_positions.description:
Leading the whole Customer Analytics area of the organization, leading the team of data / BI engineers, data scientists and data analysts, overseeing the Customer Value Management Analytics (CRM/CVM), Customer Service Analytics, Tutors Management Analytics, Product Analytics directions, focusing on building a cutting-edge data organization and delivering incremental business value. 
 - Responsible for managing key data-science and AI projects like predicting customer churn, up-sell, retention, delivering churn prediction models,  product features impact analysis, new tariff plans efficiency analysis etc.
- Successfully delivered more than 30 different data products for the customers / tutors value and lifecycle management strategies based on customer / tutor behavior analysis, which helped launching several customer management campaigns focused on bringing incremental lifetime value.
- Successfully managing the portfolio of data initiatives on Data Science, BI,  Artificial Intelligence (LLMs), fostered several data-culture projects to bring the company to a new level of data maturity and customer-centricity.
profile_positions.title: Head of Customer Analytics

profile_positions.description:
- Managing the small CRM agency with the main goal of providing strategic services in BI (Tableau), CRM/CEM, customer analytics, data mining, customer development, and business processes optimization for e-commerce, retail, finance, and insurance clients in the Netherlands, Cyprus, Ukraine, Belarus, and Russia.
- Successfully implemented several CRM-related consulting projects: Tableau BI solutions, CRM business strategy development, Campaign Management implementation (Synerise), CRM/CEM processes audit, customer satisfaction modeling, real-time triggered CEM campaigns pilot, targeted marketing processes review, and optimization.
profile_positions.title: Analytics & CRM Director, Managing partner

profile_positions.description:
- Managing the team of data engineers and analysts/data scientists, overseeing the project of migration from Amazon AWS to Microsoft Azure/Databricks data management infrastructure, Tableau BI implementation. 
- Supervised the development of the LTV prediction model for the GH players, churn prediction/residual survivability model, UA optimization/incrementality tools, commercial efficiency forecasts/ scenario analysis BI applications. Successfully implementing data-driven culture across the organization, as the result, increased the adoption of existing BI tools and dashboards.
- Organized the selection of the CRM system for the game studios, commercial negotiation on the contract, and pilot implementation.
profile_positions.title: Director of Analytics

profile_positions.description:
- Led the global department for CRM and Publisher analytics (CRM & CEM, Customer analytics, Product Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Reporting and Efficiency analysis). Managed all activities on CRM and analytics for the publisher’s HQ on the global level (EMEA, CIS, NA, APAC) on 130 M Customer Base. Was in charge of the CRM strategy development and implementation. Coordinated CRM and CEM processes between different functional and regional business units, integrated different regional CRM divisions and ensured holistic and uniform customer management approach in the organization.
- Launched the key infrastructure projects in both Analytical and Operational CRM: PEGA Marketing Implementation (Campaign Management and Omni-Channel Marketing platform), PRMP (Player Relationship Management Platform - event-based real-time communication platform on Hadoop), SAS Factory Miner (Data Mining & Predictive Analytics Automation Platform - i.e. Modeling Factory). 
- Assembled and led the analytics team for detailed product analysis (World of Tanks, World of Warships, World of Tanks Blitz, Master of Orion and other titles), market research, marketing efficiency management, customer analytics (churn prediction, win-back prediction, LTV/customer lifetime value, customer potential, monetization probability scoring).
profile_positions.title: Global CRM and Publisher Analytics Director

profile_positions.description:
- Directly managed the CRM department (20 persons) on the HQ level. Provided CRM services for different business lines of the bank – Retail, Corporate, SMB, Private Banking, and Trading & Investment. Was in charge of the Bank CRM strategy development and implementation.
- Developed customer value management and lifecycle management strategies based on customer behavior analysis. Successfully managed the portfolio of projects on both Analytical (SAS EG, EM, VA) and Operational CRM (SAP CRM: Sales, Service, and Marketing – 7 projects).
- Launched the predictive analytics for churn management and cross/up selling functions (Next Best Action, Churn Scoring, Customer Lifetime Value models). Launched a number of CRM campaigns for customer development and retention. Automated the reporting system using the SAS VA BI tool.
profile_positions.title: CRM Director

profile_positions.description:
- On a per-project basis managed the process of CRM/CEM strategy development, operational CRM implementation (SAP CRM), requirements definition, tender procedures, solution evaluation, business case development, contractual negotiations in a biggest CIS e-commerce company.
- Developed of the churn management and reporting system, implementation of the analytical BI platforms and CM DWH based on HP Vertica+Tableau. Implemented SAP CRM Campaign management for marketing automation processes.
profile_positions.title: Customer Analytics Director

profile_positions.description:
- On a temporary basis managed customer analytics and data-mining function, customer base integration function, customer loyalty / customer experience management function.
- Performed analysis of the customer data, using Data Mining tools like SPSS Modeler in order to understand customer actions and formulate predictive hypotheses about their behavior (churn, CLV, next best actions).
- Proposed integration logic for Customer Base Management (CBM) processes through different channels, enabling seamless interaction of marketing, sales and service BPs.
- Developed Customer Experience Management processes to create consistent and manageable customer experience through different channels, gather customer feedback and provide insight on different processes, in order to implement targeted Loyalty Program. This includes the detailed measurements of NPS, CSI and quantitative research on customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Customer Analytics Director

profile_positions.description:
- In charge of the strategic development and general management of the CRM & CEM direction at IVI.RU Internet media company. Supervised the operational CRM, analytical CRM and targeted recommendation systems implementation.
- Developed of the CRM implementation strategy, management of the key strategic initiatives – analytical data warehouse implementation, methods and tools for predictive customer behavior modeling, churn reporting system, proactive and reactive churn management processes, differentiated service and behavioral segmentation, analytical approach to CEM factors.
- Organized the research and analysis of the key satisfaction metrics, CSI research & generating follow-up recommendations to different departments. In charge of implementation of the system of customer value management, including CLV modeling, customer lifecycle management and multi-channel marketing campaign management system.
profile_positions.title: CRM Director

profile_positions.description:
- Led a division (12 persons) with strategic priorities of implementing CRM, Data mining, customer analytics programs at the Bank. Was in charge of CRM selection (SAP CRM, Siebel CRM solution analysis), BRD analysis, key requirements definition, tender procedures, system integrator choice, overall planning, resource, and delivery management.
- Developed the CRM implementation strategy both from operational and analytical sides, key policies and business processes, including customer information center based on CRM solution (strategies for cross/up- selling and service based on client’s behavior and segment).
- Participated in a loyalty program development for Sberbank: has developed the requirements, made analysis of loyalty platforms, developed propositions on mechanics for segmented rewarding system based on customer behavior, designed of multi-brand umbrella segmented loyalty program along with marketing unit.
- Managed the Retail CRM implementation program (Siebel CRM implementation), including 5 projects: Sales, Tele-Marketing, Contact centers, Branches, Business Core Functionality. General management and overseeing of following projects: Analytical Warehouse and Data Mining tools implementation (SAS, Teradata), Data Quality project , BI and Reporting system implementation.
- Launched cross/upsell marketing campaigns with overall reach more than 70 mln. clients and ROI of 173%.
profile_positions.title: Head of CRM and customer analysis

profile_positions.description:
- Managed the CRM division at the leading telecom operator in Russia and CIS, supervised all ongoing activities on CRM and loyalty in different Business Units at the Corporate Center level, organized the development and sharing of the best practices on CRM and loyalty among the MTS Group in CIS.
- Developed and implemented the MTS Group CRM Strategy (Russia, Ukraine, Belorussia, Armenia, Uzbekistan, Turkmenistan), proposed new initiatives and successfully managed their implementation on the Corporate Center level.
- Controlled the churn KPI's fulfillment in business units, developed MTS Corporate Policies and Business processes methodologies (Churn Management policy, Contact policy, CRM regulations, CRM campaign evaluation methodology, Churn & Loyalty KPI measurement, Proactive Retention and Churn prediction methodology).
- Successfully managed the Oracle Siebel CRM implementation delivery on the marketing, call-center and corporate clients projects, coordinated the cross-functional tasks in CRM projects in Russia and Ukraine between the system integrator, consultants, businessowners and stakeholders.
- Have developed the micro-segmented approach for CRM marketing campaigns (SAS). To create the Churn Management Strategy For the MTS Group in CIS.
profile_positions.title: Head of CRM
